instructions:
Melt margarine and stir in Real Lemon. Pour over fish fillets and marinate in refrigerate for at least 2
hours.
Heat the oil to 350 F in a fryer or electric skillet. Mix together the flour, crumbs, Parmesan cheese and
spices and set aside. Prepare the egg wash by beating the egg and then mixing in the milk. Dip the fillets in
the egg wash, then bread with the flour mixture and lay on waxed paper. Repeat the coating process by
dipping each fillet again in the egg wash and then the flour mixture.
Fry in the deep fat turning at least once until golden brown, about 3 to 5 minutes.
ingredients: 1 lb yellow lake perch fillets (or flounder)
name: Herb Batter Fried Fish
